title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build Resilient GenAI & Agentic Apps with Intelligent Memory (DAT105)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用智能内存构建弹性生成式AI和智能体应用 (DAT105)
abstract: As GenAI moves beyond chatbots, the next wave of apps must think, remember, and act in real time. This session shows how to build resilient, agentic AI systems with intelligent memory using CockroachDB and AWS Bedrock. Learn to unify transactional and vector data to power context-aware systems, reduce latency, and simplify pipelines. See how CockroachDB’s distributed SQL delivers the performance, consistency, and global scale to run adaptive, memory-driven AI securely—anywhere your business operates. This presentation is brought to you by CockroachDB, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 随着生成式AI超越聊天机器人的范畴，下一波应用必须能够实时思考、记忆和行动。本次会议展示如何使用CockroachDB和AWS Bedrock构建具有智能记忆的弹性代理AI系统。学习如何统一事务和向量数据来驱动上下文感知系统、降低延迟并简化管道。了解CockroachDB的分布式SQL如何提供性能、一致性和全球规模，以便在您业务运营的任何地方安全地运行自适应、记忆驱动的AI。本演示由AWS合作伙伴CockroachDB为您呈现。
